remarks: The isomorphism H maps to subspaces.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dihsslss.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihsslss.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihsslss.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihsslss.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
dihrnlss $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. ran I ) -> X e. S ) $.
